title: Google\Cloud\Gaming\V1\GameServerCluster
name: GameServerCluster
description:
A game server cluster resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gaming.v1.GameServerCluster

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the game server cluster, in the following form: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/realms/{realm}/gameServerClusters/{cluster}. For example, projects/my-project/locations/{location}/realms/zanzibar/gameServerClusters/my-onprem-cluster.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: The labels associated with this game server cluster. Each label is a key-value pair.

params.name: data.connection_info
params.description: The game server cluster connection information. This information is used to manage game server clusters.

params.name: data.cluster_state
params.description: Output only. The state of the Kubernetes cluster, this will be available if 'view' is set to FULL in the relevant List/Get/Preview request.
